original_text: When the jailer woke and saw that the prison doors were open, he drew his sword and was about to kill himself, supposing that the prisoners had escaped.
korean_text: 간수가 자다가 깨어 옥문들이 열린 것을 보고 죄수들이 도망한 줄 생각하고 칼을 빼어 자결하려 하거늘

sentences.original_text: and saw that the prison doors were open
sentences.korean_translation: 감옥 문들이 열려 있는 것을 보았습니다

sentences.original_text: and was about to kill himself
supposing that the prisoners had escaped
